meanings.definition: The quality of being aggressive or forceful in behavior.
meanings.sent1: His assaultiveness in the game made him a fierce competitor.
meanings.sent2: Her assaultiveness in negotiations often led to successful deals.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's assaultiveness towards the mailman was more playful than threatening.
meanings.sent4: The assaultiveness of the storm left a trail of destruction in its wake.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's assaultiveness in teaching motivated students to excel.

meanings.definition: The act of physically attacking or harming someone.
meanings.sent1: The assaultiveness of the criminal shocked the community.
meanings.sent2: The assaultiveness of the boxer was evident in every punch thrown.
meanings.sent3: The cat's assaultiveness towards the toy mouse was amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: The assaultiveness of the waves crashing against the shore was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The assaultiveness of the paintball players added excitement to the game.
